name: Gribbit
description:
Gribbit is an action/arcade game where you stay alive by feeding on insects. Race against time to keep your stomach full, collect big combos and compete with other players by reaching the highest score!

v 1.1 changes:

  • online highscores
  • a boss
  • new enemy
  • graphical improvement

Originally made for Frog Jam by

@KasdeyaRose

@swonqi
